Text: Mr Who can you resize this?

Resize yourself.  If you are a Windows user get Image Resizer Powertoy for Windows XP (Microsoft makes this).  There is also one for Windows 7 at CodePlex.  Google search it.  Right click a picture of a group of pictures and choose the resize option and then set the height or width (not both) and bam, it does it for you.
@tt54  Think about those that pay on a per/Gb basis..
